title: Lakshmi Kasu Haaram with Temple Jhumka Pendants - A Divine Adornment
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features a fine Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: A classic Kasu Haaram design reimagined with modern elegance. Showcases intricate Lakshmi coin detailing, meticulously crafted Temple Jhumka pendants, and alternating Emerald and CZ accents. Features a central pendant with Goddess Lakshmi seated on a lotus, embellished with delicate filigree work. The peacock design on the bottom enhances its cultural charm.
occasions: half-saree function). A statement piece for the modern woman who appreciates timeless tradition.
description: This exquisite Kasu Haaram is a testament to traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a contemporary twist. The combination of Lakshmi coins, sparkling CZ stones, vibrant Emeralds and the lustrous pearls creates a piece that is both opulent and meaningful. The Goddess Lakshmi motif symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it an auspicious addition to your jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting brilliance, making it an heirloom piece for generations.
